thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cbo Territoria Launches Issue Of Convertible Bonds for Maximum Amount of 30 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cbo Territoria Launches Issue Of Convertible Bonds for Maximum Amount of 30 Million Euros
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Cbo Territoria Sa:
* LAUNCHES ISSUE OF CONVERTIBLE BONDS (ORNANE), WITH MATURITY DATE OF JULY 1, 2024
* MAXIMUM NOMINAL AMOUNT OF EUR 30 MILLION * BONDS TO BE ISSUED AT PAR ON FEB.7, 2018 * ANNUAL COUPON FOR THE BONDS AT 3.75 PERCENT, PAYABLE ON JAN 1 AND JULY 1 EACH YEAR‍​
* FACE VALUE OF THE BONDS AT EUR 4.85 EACH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
